price: Amanfoͻ a Yɛabͻ wͻn no mu bi wͻ hͻ a wͻde nokorε no kyerε (nnipa) kwan, na wͻdi εho nokorε nso.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
